name: Subnar
description:
Subnar is a local multiplayer versus submarine shooter. Works on Mac and PC, all you need is a keyboard and friend to play!

P1 Controls

  • W - up
  • S - down
  • 1 - shoot torpedo
  • 2 - dodge

P2 Controls

  • Up arrow - up
  • Down arrow - down
  • < - shoot torpedo
  • > - dodge
